Package net.nergi

Class Utils

Object
Utils
public final class Utils
extends Object
Utility class that holds method shortcuts.

    • getBr

      public static BufferedReader getBr()
      Gets the current BufferedReader instance in this class. Required due to 5d30.

    • listOf

      @SafeVarargs @Deprecated(since="2021/01/16") public static <T> List<T> listOf​(T... items)
      Deprecated.
      Constructs an immutable list of items. Depreciated. Use List.of() instead.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type to use in list
      Parameters:
      items - Items of a certain type
      Returns:
      An immutable list of type T

    • hashMapOf

      public static <X,​ Y> HashMap<X,​Y> hashMapOf​(X[] keys, Y[] values) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a HashMap from two arrays. The arrays must be of equal length.
      Type Parameters:
      X - Type of keys
      Y - Type of values
      Parameters:
      keys - The final map's key set
      values - The final map's value set
      Returns:
      An instance of HashMap with the desired keys and values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the arrays are not of equal length.

    • hashMapOf

      public static <X,​ Y> HashMap<X,​Y> hashMapOf​(List<X> keys, List<Y> values) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Constructs a HashMap from two Lists. The Lists must be of equal length.
      Type Parameters:
      X - Type of keys
      Y - Type of values
      Parameters:
      keys - The final map's key set
      values - The final map's value set
      Returns:
      An instance of HashMap with the desired keys and values.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the Lists are not of equal length.

    • getUserLines

      public static ArrayList<String> getUserLines()
      Gets lines of input from the user. Stops collecting lines when EOF is given (via CTRL+Z in Windows or CTRL+D in *nix).

    • getUserLines

      public static ArrayList<String> getUserLines​(int amount)
      Gets lines of input from the user. Stops collecting lines when EOF is given (via CTRL+Z in Windows or CTRL+D in *nix), or when the number of collected lines exceeds some amount.

    • getUserLines

      public static ArrayList<String> getUserLines​(int amount, boolean shouldEarlyReturn)
      Gets lines of input from the user. Stops collecting lines when EOF is given (via CTRL+Z in Windows or CTRL+D in *nix), or when the number of collected lines exceeds some amount. Does not return early on IOException or null input if shouldEarlyReturn is false.

    • benchmarkTime

      public static void benchmarkTime​(Runnable r)
      Runs some code and prints the approximate average time taken to complete. This default version runs 100 times and prints the average.

    • benchmarkTime

      public static void benchmarkTime​(Runnable r, int amount)
      Runs some code and prints the approximate average time taken to complete.
      Parameters:
      r - Runnable code
      amount - Amount of runs

    • pass

      public static void pass()
      An empty method used as a sort of "do nothing" method.
